title: Google Internship in Vision/ML
summary: My group has intern openings for winter and summer. Winter may be too late (but if you really want winter, ping me and I'll find out feasibility). We use OCR for Google Books, frames from YouTube videos, spam images, unreadable PDFs encountered by the crawler, images from Google's StreetView cameras, Android and few other areas. Recognizing individual character candidates is a key step in OCR
